documents.document: @jcatwindsor I love pugs! Thank you for making my day!
@MrLDC I saw that too! I can't believe how much damage can be done in so little time.
We're officially in 2017 🙌
@FedeBaArcheo We're doing better thank you, just dealing with some big aftershocks.
@jcatwindsor We're okay! Central Wellington got the worst of it, luckily we avoided a lot of the damage.
@rebeca_dlc yes thank you! Just dealing with the aftershocks
@UncleDynamite Thanks Uncle!
@EricVespe Thanks! A lot of aftershocks are happening, we've been issued a tsunami warning.
@chinlovesyou thank you! Really shaken, will be okay.
@chinlovesyou get in a doorway or under a table, put your chin to your chest and cover the back of your neck. Avoid all windows. X
@julee_princess_ No word from Christchurch but it hit the top of the South Island so I think they should be okay
@HollyEliStew the top of the South Island
Huge 7.5 earthquake just hit NZ. Is everyone okay?
I recommend reading this letter Aaron Sorkin wrote to his 15 year old daughter after Trump was elected: https://t.co/WHnDn5LJ5E
@jcatwindsor and how does hate win at the end of the day?Its baffling. Just know the good people will rally together &stand against the hate
@jcatwindsor totally- I am heartbroken for them because I know they fought really hard and this is their worst nightmare.
I think this election really hurts because the only reason a bigot was voted president was because millions of people share his views.
@leithmcp @Aaron_Morgan Leith make sure you send your kids Trump memes like the ones my mum sends me
@Aaron_Morgan @EricVespe Might have to settle for less. I think couch surfing here is better than staying where you are right now.
@EricVespe its beautiful and summer. Time for a 4 year visit I think?
If there's one lesson learned it's that we need to stop laughing about Kanye in 2020.
@JVen50 I agree Bernie would've been a way better candidate
@ElvenBallerina I don't judge you! I'm feeling so sad for my friends in the US right now who put up a good fight against this asshole.
@JVen50 I love Bernie and wanted him to win. It's just scary where the election is right now, I can't imagine the US in Trumps hands.
@Aaron_Morgan I can't bring myself to go there yet, I need to hold out hope even though I'm sure you're right.
@sineadjdaly yeah! All of my friends in the US felt the same. No idea there were so many Trump supporters.
@spencerkate thank you for voting against him!
Just wondering how a narcissistic, racist, homophobic, misogynistic lunatic who brags about sexual assault can be this close to winning
Calm down everyone, there's plenty of room for you in NZ
@AudaciousKili Please please please
@Aaron_Morgan @pauljeremiah we also have the actual Shire so....
@Aaron_Morgan This is too scary
@pauljeremiah Thank you this is great!
@pauljeremiah true. I wasn't in Florida too long ago and I spoke to some people who told me how amazing Trump is so idk whats gonna happen
@Aaron_Morgan Hello you two! Remember if the results are bad, you can always move to NZ!
@pauljeremiah but what about this https://t.co/PWWalCmypY
@pauljeremiah the election
@Aaron_Morgan I understand, that whole episode was really hard to watch.
Never ever going to get over that Walking Dead episode.
@LifeAtBagEnd that's the difference 12 years will make!
@wowinthedetails very cute!
@BrownAds haha I'm in the uk. Is this what you're all like?
Chinese whispers with two people doesn't work. It just means you're whispering back and fourth.
Couple sitting next to me is on some serious drugs. The guy injected the girl with something and now they're playing Chinese whispers.
@CarterNixon when they actually had it right in the first sentence. https://t.co/PgBKydYfwL
@elenaal30847596 Thank you so much!!
@BrophyJed you're right, no one wants to take responsibility for it.
@jechevr Aw I love that!
@BrophyJed Something needs to be done about it. There's too many Internet trolls spreading hate without suffering consequences.
I fear we're going to become desensitised to the hate we see so often on the Internet. We're forgetting the impact words have on some people
Looking at what people sent Leslie Jones on Twitter makes me lose hope in humanity.
@julee_princess_ Yeah I'm nervous to see what the future holds for everyone over there.
@simon_lindsell I think that would be a good idea right about now.
@EricVespe I miss him so much. He was the best.
@theoneringnet I would've been keen but unfortunately I'm leaving tonight! Next time though!
@theoneringnet I am! It's so inspiring!
@EricVespe yes! Exciting things are happening soon. You should definitely visit!
@EricVespe and I'm still waiting for you to reply...
@ThatCoffeeBrat Yeah I don't think he had bad intentions. It's just a shame my dad is now being called "brutal" for something he never said.
@JohnSant87 Maybe he has his facts mixed up. All i know is that defiantly wasn't the audition scrip they used, and my dad has never met him.
@itsIvs that thought has crossed my mind
@apema85 Who knows, maybe he was trying to make a bad joke. All i know is that none of it happened.
@carolmarshall exactly! not sure why Jake felt the need to make up that story.
@Pabst1994 Hi! Sadly The Silmarillion will never be adapted into a film because the Tolkien estate owns the rights and will never sell them.
@isiodith it has a great script and proves you don't need a huge budget to make a good movie.
@JordiHimself I'm working on other projects right now
@Leemitage sadly not right now
@EricVespe I was playing with Gizmo the other day!
@sweats_wine exactly 👍
Serial killer documentaries and chill
@EricVespe Agreed! I loved Jareth and his goblins. I would replay the Magic Dance over and over.
Labyrinth was my all time favourite movie as a kid.
This is the worst news

It's 2016! Happy new year!
@EricVespe haha I'm very interested to hear what she says about it! I think she's just as confused as everyone else.
@EricVespe that's what dad said! He's really into it and keeps yelling at the tv.
@billiejruck Um can you please get up here ASAP? I miss you and we have serial killer shows to watch.
@EricVespe episode 4! My parents just finished binge watching the whole thing and now they want to re-watch it with me.
@EricVespe it's so insane!!!
Merry Christmas everyone!!!!
@ronansik nothing is confirmed right now
